text: Yehi woh hai jiss ki bisharat Allah Taalaa apney bandon ko dey raha hai jo eman laye aur (sunnat kay mutabiq) nek aemaal kiyey to keh dijiyey! Kay mein iss per tum say koi badla nahi chahata magar mohabbat rishtaydaari ki jo shaks koi neki keray hum uss kay liye uss ki neki mein aur neki barha den gay be-shak Allah Taalaa boht bakhshney wala (aur) boht qadardaan hai
